publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3687.1 Rhoda Grant: Royal Mail’s Threat to Lifeline Postbus Services—As an amendment to motion (S3M-3687) in the name of John Farquhar Munro, leave out from "asks" to "service" and insert "calls on the Scottish Government to hold urgent talks with the Royal Mail and provide funding to secure the postbus service".
